Html:
Hi! I am new in this forum.

I have a excel document with two sheets as a template.

The first gets the data from the database using php, the second has a chart that uses the data on the first sheet.

When I was loading the data using macros the chart had the information on it, now that I use php to load the data in the first sheet, the chart on the second sheet is not there.

Any help will be appreciated.
Currently phpexcel does not support charts. All not supported object are removed when writing. It is therefore not possible to retain the chart.
